actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Hearings Held by Task Force on Libraries and Memorials.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Architect of the Capitol to accept gifts and bequests of personal property and money for the benefit of the Capitol Buildings Art Collection.

summary.text: Authorizes the Architect of the Capitol to accept gifts and bequests of personal property and money for the benefit of the Capitol Buildings Art Collection. Directs the Architect to act as curator for such Collection and submit an annual report to the Congress.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Architect of the Capitol to accept gifts and bequests of personal property and money for the benefit of the Capitol Buildings Art Collection.
